row.process: ! --------------------------------------------- :SET &SEL_BESCHREIBUNG# = 'Ablaufmgt_Fondsswitch_Selekt' :SET &VALUTA_VON# = '&VALUTA#' :SET &VALUTA_BIS# = '&VALUTA#' :SET &PROGRAMMTYP# = '800' :SET &PROGRAMMTYPAUSL# = '&PROGRAMMTYPAUSL#' :SET &PROGRAM# = '&PROG_LC#' :SET &INIFILE# = '&PROGRAM#_RL&ABLAUFMGT#.ini' :SET &OPTIONS# = '&INIFILE#' :SET &LOGFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&SEL_BESCHREIBUNG#_RL&ABLAUFMGT#.log' :SET &OUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_RL&ABLAUFMGT#_&TS#.out' :SET &SORTMODE# = 'S' ! --------------------------------------------- :PUT_ATT ARCHIVE_KEY1 = "Verarb: &ABLAUFMGT#" ! --------------------------------------------- cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&INIFILE# MANDANT = &MANDANTEN# ABVTRNR = &AB_VTR_NR# BISVTRNR = &BIS_VTR_NR# TRACE = &TRACE# PROT_VTR_FILTER = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL# PROT_MSG_TYPE = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL# BESCHREIBUNG = &SEL_BESCHREIBUNG# VON = &VALUTA_VON# BIS = &VALUTA_BIS# PROGRAMMTYP = &PROGRAMMTYP# PROGRAMMTYPAUSL = &PROGRAMMTYPAUSL# LOGFILE = &LOGFILE# OUTFILE = &OUTFILE# SORTMODE = &SORTMODE# __EOF__ ! --------------------------------------------- :IF &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = "J" echo 'Test &PROGRAM# &TS# RL&ABLAUFMGT#' > &WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#_RL&ABLAUFMGT#_1.out :ENDIF ! --------------------------------------------- :PUT_ATT ARCHIVE_KEY2 ="Restlaufzeit - &ABLAUFMGT#J)" ! --------------------------------------- !starten Anwendung :INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB ! ---------------------------------------------
